entries.bio_effect_controller: A biological effect controller allows for a more focused application of medical techniques.
entries.liquid_suspension: This liquid suspension solution appears to be extremely viscous.
entries.release_mech_duration: This is a chemical release duration mechanism.
entries.solid_delivery_shell: This is a solid delivery shell.
entries.drug_duration_compound: A compound that determines the duration of a drug.
entries.drug_strength_compound: A compound that determines the strength of a drug.
entries.drug_strength_compound_2: A slightly advanced compound that determines the duration of a drug.
entries.drug_strenth_compound_2: A slightly advanced compound that determines the duration of a drug.
entries.dispersal_mechanism_advanced: This advanced dispersal mechanism is more adept at discharging its chemical ingredients to the specified place.
entries.infection_amplifier_advanced: This advanced infection amplifier increases the efficiency of offensive chemical agents.
entries.resilience_compound_advanced: This advanced resilience compound has a potent resilience effect.
entries.dispersal_mechanism: This dispersal mechanism allows a controlled discharge of chemicals.
entries.infection_amplifier: This infection amplifier increases the effect of chemical attacks.
entries.resilience_compound: This resilience compound creates an active resistance to certain maladies.
entries.bio_effect_controller_advanced: This advanced biological effect controller allows for greater focused application of medical techniques.
entries.release_mech_duration_advanced: This is an advanced chemical release duration mechanism.
entries.solid_delivery_shell_advanced: This is an advanced solid delivery shell.
entries.liquid_suspension_advanced: This advanced liquid suspension solution appears to be extremely viscous.
entries.funnel: A funnel is used to direct fluid from one container to another.
entries.mushroom: A spore organism, mushrooms have many different applications in science, cooking, and medicine.
entries.rancor_bile: This rancor bile could be used in place of a medical dispersal mechanism.
entries.janta_blood: This Janta blood could be used as  a biological effect controller.
entries.infection_amplifier_donkuwah: This Donkuwah poison would make an effective infection amplifier.
entries.liquid_suspension_quest: This enhanced liquid suspension solution appears to be extremely viscous.
entries.dispersal_mechanism_quest: This dispersal mechanism has been modified to discharge its chemical ingredients over a wider area from a longer range.
entries.spider_venom: This spider venom appears as if it would make an effective infection amplifier.
